text: niscayanga, allah nu mariyu ayana pravaktalanu tiraskarince varu mariyu allah mariyu ayana pravaktala madhya bhedabhavam cupagore varu (ante allah nu visvasinci, pravaktalanu tiraskarince varu) mariyu: "Memu kondaru pravaktalanu visvasistamu, mari kondarini tiraskaristamu." Ani ane varu mariyu (visvasa - avisvasalaku) madhya marganni kalpinca gorevaru
